pages.text: Blacksmiths and soldiers alike use the Great Hammer for its strength in forging and in battle. If the wielder's attack recharge meter is full, the hammer will hit beings at a great radius though it will take quite a while for the meter to recover which can be mitigated if the wielder doesn't hold anything offhand.

The hammer can mine a 3x3 area, but have less mining speed than pickaxes. As the hammer is use for forging, right-clicking a Block of Iron with it will turn it into a heavily damaged Anvil. The hammer can be repaired on an anvil with an Iron Ingot.
